detail_desc: T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Knee-length coat in soft, heavily draping faux fur with notch lapels and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and discreet side pockets. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Lined.
Shorts in twill made from a cotton and linen blend with a high paper bag waist, visible buttons at the front, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Block-coloured top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and jersey-lined hood with a drawstring at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Block-coloured top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and jersey-lined hood with a drawstring at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in stretch jersey with a print motif on the front, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a lined, layered tulle skirt with an asymmetric hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a turned-up hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a turned-up hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a turned-up hem.

Jacket in an airy, patterned weave with short, wide sleeves and a narrow tie belt at the waist.
Maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits at the front. Unlined.
Maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits at the front. Unlined.
Oversized jacket in soft pile with a yoke in woven fabric. High collar, zip down the front, a large flap patch pocket with press-studs, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
High-waisted trousers in imitation leather with a zip fly, hook-and-eye fastening, front pockets and tapered legs with seams front and back. Detachable belt with metal D-rings.

Wide trousers in sturdy cotton twill. High waist with wide belt loops, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and pleats at the front. Low crotch, a zip fly, side pockets and patch back pockets with a button. Wide legs that taper slightly at the hems.

Wide trousers in sturdy cotton twill. High waist with wide belt loops, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and pleats at the front. Low crotch, a zip fly, side pockets and patch back pockets with a button. Wide legs that taper slightly at the hems.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Wide cardigan in a rib-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Body in jersey with cut-out sections and a metal ring at the waist, high-cut legs and press-studs at the crotch.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Single-breasted tuxedo jacket in woven fabric with satin details. Covered button at the front, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Headband in a soft rib knit with a sparkly stone appliqué on the front.
Headband in a soft rib knit with a sparkly stone appliqué on the front.
Wide, V-neck sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with decorative straps at the neckline, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a high waist, pleats at the front, a concealed zip in one side and two slits at the front. Unlined.
Jersey body with a low-cut neckline at the back and a small stand-up collar that fastens at the back of the neck with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Jersey body with a low-cut neckline at the back and a small stand-up collar that fastens at the back of the neck with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.

Semi shiny tights with a high waist and a shaping effect on the tummy, waist and thighs. 100 denier.

Glittery ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front, elastic strap over the foot and grosgrain trim around the top. Satin insoles.

Long, sleeveless top in a soft, rib knit with a turtle neck and slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved cardigan in sequin-embroidered tulle with a V-neck and concealed button at the front. Lined in woven fabric.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in satin. Top with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and wide legs.

Short dress in patterned chiffon with frill trims and a V-neck with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Sewn-in wrapover at the front, an elasticated seam at the waist, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Lined.

Short dress in patterned chiffon with frill trims and a V-neck with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Sewn-in wrapover at the front, an elasticated seam at the waist, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Lined.

A-line skirt in lacquered jersey with a high waist, D-ring belt and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline and intarsia motif with an appliqué on the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in a textured bouclé weave with a concealed zip at the back and fake front pockets with a decorative button.
